summary: Like to collect things in Skyrim like a Nordish hoarder with O.C.D.?  Welcome to your new home!Decorated with many new models this hall features a vast array of safe chests and display tables, all individually marked with the item being collected in them.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1057.photobucket.com/albums/t381/Valk69/9f0b01e8.jpg[/IMG]

[color=Red]PLEASE endorse if ya like.  Only takes a second!!![/color]

[color=Yellow]Coming soon, more armor display and less tables and maybe a shooting range.[/color]


[color=Cyan]Like to collect things in Skyrim like a Nordish hoarder with O.C.D.?  Welcome to your new home!  All the \"automatic\" weapons racks, bookshelves etc all seem to bug and ruin a home sooner or later so I\'ve found the best way to display is just the good old fashioned table method.  I hate reading descriptions as much as you do so I\'ll just list what this home has in store for you:

Map Marker north of Rorikstead
Enchantment Table
Alchemy Table
Forge
Smelter
Armor Work Bench
Sharpening Wheel
Cooking Area
Full Bedroom
Dinner Table
Fish Tank

Seperate chests and display tables for:

Ingots
Ore
Food
Ingredients
Potions & Poisons
Books
Scrolls
Smithing Materials
Soul Gems
Gems
Enchanted Weapons
Enchanted Armor
Staffs
Bows
Arrows
Jewelry
Enchanted Jewelry
Items to Sell
Items to Sort
Misc.
Tools
Keys
Clothing
Favorites
Quest Items
Collectables

Available with mannequins or without if you want to use your own dropable ones

Installation:  Download with Mod Manager or manually then extract contents to your Data folder.

Should be fully compatable with everything and no other files are needed.

[/color]
author: Valkyrie
